name: VoiceFileInfo
desc: Defines a voice file information structure.

items.name: var fileSpec: FSSpec
items.desc: A file system specification structure that contains the volume, directory, and name of the file containing the voice. Generally, files containing a single voice are of type kTextToSpeechVoiceFileType, and files containing multiple voices are of type kTextToSpeechVoiceBundleType.

items.name: var resID: Int16
items.desc: The resource ID of the voice in the file. Voices are stored in resources of type kTextToSpeechVoiceType.
